text: Khea klaw wa kha tæ phracea khxng kha phraxngkh! Pord di thrng hı mi sayyan hnung kæ kha phraxngkh dwy theid phraxngkh tras wa sayyan khxng cea nan khux cea ca mi samarth phud kæ phukhn pen wela sam wan nxkcak dwy kar sædng thathang theanan læa cng raluk thung phracea khxng cea mak «læa cng klaw sdudi nı khwam brisuththi khxng phraxngkh thang nı wela yun læa wela chea
